content: @Jamie Jones -- I seem to recall that you created something to generate the glossary page? If so, would you mind regenerating that and committing to the implication branch? I was doing a review of the QA and found it has many invalid links, seemingly related to the profiles that have gone away.
several manual steps were included in that generation, so I was only planning on re-generating it before freezes/publications

at this point, I would recommend an opposite approach -- manually managing that glossary page as our guidance on elements, and then ensuring the language is consistent on the structureDefs with a JIRA pre-freeze. The info in the structuredefs is so hard to view in the build directly it is nearly useless in my opinion.
Fair enough :slight_smile:
hmm...I don't think I understand. Are you talking about within the structure def or on the structure definition page? @Jamie Jones
the page is pretty easy to see, that's why I ask.

The glossary appendix pulled names/descriptions/short names/notes/codes/bindings from our structuredefs and expanded relevant lists but it was a one-off process, I didn't have time to build it out into something repeatable
